3D Artist, Team Chaos, LLC
Austin, Texas — Mar/2012-July/201
  • Modeled all 3D assets, which included creating a high poly 3D model from a concept or reference, converting the model to a low poly version for the game, unwrapping coordinates for texturing, and creating proper normal maps for the model as needed.
  • Textured either hand painted art deco on models to give them a cartoon stylized appearance or create a realistic texture to make the model appear as real as possible.
  • Created proper rigs for the models as needed. Everything from a bipedal character to adding one or two bones to various props items, such as a flag.
  • Dealt with any and all technical issues with art assets and the game engine.
  • Wrote scripts that helped with workflow by procedurally generating assets.

Food Inspection Specialist, United States Army
Fort Knox, Kentucky — Sept/2004-Jan/2010
  • Using scientific method; evaluated over 71 facilities in 12 different locations across Western Germany that served over 150,000 military members and their families.
  • Created high quality training material, coordinated with facility managers, and trained over 7,100 facility staff on various subjects including food safety, proper hand washing procedures, and hot and cold food handling.
  • Inspected and tested food products on receipt and in storage by taking statistical samples, making sensory evaluations, adhering to packaging, packing, and marking requirements in accordance with DOD standards, and assuring proper handling of food via documentation and storage temperature assessment.
  • Used lab equipment safely and in standards to the manufacturer to insure proper lab practices and procedures.
